metadata.feature_description: Processes XML sitemaps to seed URL crawling operations.

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Site Settings > Search > Crawling tab
steps.expected: Crawling settings page displays with URL Paths section
steps.actual: Crawling tab displayed with URL Paths section showing existing URL entries and 'Add Url' button

steps.action: Click 'Add Url' button to open URL configuration form
steps.expected: Form opens with URL, Sitemap URL, and other configuration fields
steps.actual: Form opened successfully showing Url, Sitemap URL, DNN Role Impersonation, Enable Spidering, and Windows Authentication fields

steps.expected: Both fields accept the URL values
steps.actual: Both URL and Sitemap URL fields accepted the entered values correctly

steps.action: Click Save to save the URL configuration with sitemap
steps.expected: Configuration saves successfully and new URL entry appears in list
steps.actual: Configuration saved successfully. New URL entry 'http://localhost:8081/' appeared in the URL Paths list

steps.action: Click 'Add Url' button to open URL configuration form
steps.expected: Form opens for adding new URL with Sitemap URL field
steps.actual: Form opened successfully with Sitemap URL field available

steps.action: Enter URL 'http://testinvalidsitemap.example' and invalid Sitemap URL 'http://invalid.url/notasitemap.xml'
steps.expected: Fields accept the values for validation on save
steps.actual: Both fields accepted the invalid URL values for testing

steps.action: Click Save to attempt saving configuration with invalid sitemap
steps.expected: System validates sitemap URL and displays error message if invalid
steps.actual: System correctly validated the sitemap URL and displayed error: 'Unable to validate Sitemap file. Check the Sitemap is available, well formed and a valid Sitemap file. You can see Sitemap format on http://www.sitemaps.org/protocol.php'

steps.action: Open URL configuration form and verify Sitemap URL field exists
steps.expected: Sitemap URL field is present and accessible in the form
steps.actual: Sitemap URL field is present with label and tooltip icon, positioned below the URL field in the configuration form

observations: The Sitemap URL field is located in Admin > Site Settings > Search > Crawling tab under 'URL Paths' section
Code review confirms SitemapHelper.cs validates sitemaps against XML schema (sitemap.xsd or siteindex.xsd from sitemaps.org)
Code supports gzipped sitemaps (.gz extension) which are automatically decompressed before parsing
Code supports sitemap index files - recursively processes nested sitemaps from index files
When a sitemap is invalid, the Spider falls back to crawling from the base URL instead
The UI provides helpful error message with link to sitemap protocol documentation when validation fails
